name: Stache Wax
description:
Moustache wax made of 100% organic ingredients.

contains local organic bees wax and organic castor oil.

Application instructions: warm container first in warm water or in the sun. Take small amount of wax and apply to each side of moustache separately. Take a comb to work out any large pieces of wax. Twist with finger tips

$1 from everything sold goes to BC Cancer Foundation!
